Text: Cheers mate. What's up with British EuroSport not showing the full event? Regardless, I miss watching British EuroSport for the Biathlon, Ski Jumping and MotoGP!! Any clue where I can get the Ski Jumping? Cheers again mate!

Eurosport often show the live biathlon and cross country events in full on European Eurosport but show highlight editions on British Eurosport. They basically haven't got enough channels. Things like alpine skiing, ski jumping, snooker and tennis take priority over biathlon and cross country on British Eurosport. Sometimes they don't even have a highlight edition - makes you wonder why they bother having English speaking commentators.

If you want full coverage then the best way is with their Eurosport Player. If you live outside of Europe then you might need to use a European VPN. If you want to view the British Eurosport Player then you might need to use a British VPN.
